page.title: 10Fauna
page.content:
The varying habitat ___ water, pine forest, hedges, fields produces a {large number of nesting birds}and 196 species have been recorded in the area.
All the common ones are found plus the increasingly rare{stone curlews and all species of{owls.}By the water there are{herons}and{kingfishers}and many species of{duck and geese.}The birds that are seen everywhere, however, in fields and on the roads are{pheasants and partridges. { { }Rabbit, hare, badger, squirrel, stoat, weasel, fox, all kinds of rodents, water voles are found.{In the {forest are 2 kinds of deer.
(contd on P 11)
